blocks.text1: Our world revolves around the customer.
blocks.text2: We care about quality customer service.
blocks.text3: We do our best to earn your trust.
The program of additional service (diagnosis, cleaning and repair) equipment purchased in retail stores for 2, 3 or 5 years, depending on your preference.

blocks.text2: You found cheaper? We will refund 200% of the difference!
blocks.text3: Even if within 7 days, you will find a similar product from a competitor cheaper than we paid - we will return you to your bonus account 200% of the difference between the purchase price and found a lower price.

blocks.text2: All items in our store are accompanied by a guarantee.
blocks.text3: We value our reputation, and therefore do not knowingly sell unofficial or illegal goods with no guarantee and service support in Ukraine.

blocks.text3: Our task is not only to simply sell the right product, but also to inform and educate the buyer. Armed with comprehensive information about an interesting device and its main competitors, you will be able to make an informed buying decision is the commodity you want. Our site is visited by an average of more than 800 000 unique visitors per day, and this number continues to grow. Not stopping there, we continue to build momentum, striving to become the best in the country portal of electronics and household appliances - a place where you will be able to choose and purchase any equipment - conscious, inexpensive and convenient.
